Warnings
  • Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Figures/outline: unknown concept "pack"
Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Figures/outline

Function Figure outline(, map[int,Color] coloredLines, FProperty props...)
Description An outline is a rectangle with colored horizontal lines and is primarily used to summarize information related to a source file. Colored lines indicate different findings in the file. Dimension are determined by the width and height properties. coloredLines maps line numbers to a desired color.
Examples 
r = color("Red");
g = color("Green");
render(outline((100 : r, 125 : g, 190 : r), size(50, 200)));
Benefits In combination with pack or hvcat information amount large amounts of files can be summarized densely.
